title: Seasons of the Gunslinger
description: Sean O'Connor, a former Union soldier turned shootist, is running from his past. In the dead hours of night he is visited by the Devil himself, offering the deal of a lifetime; the power to cheat death and become the most deadly man on the planet. The price? Once a season for a hundred years Sean will do the bidding of the Devil. The rewards are great but what is the real cost? Why choose Sean? What is Old Scratch's goal? Come along as the Devil's gunslinger shoots his way around the world and through time itself. It's gonna be one hell of a ride.
author: Christopher Westhoff
